languages.text: "Один цепкий клерк Администратума усомнился в подлинности отчетов, поступающих с руин улья Сципиона 84-249. Он сам посетил разбор завалов и спустился на нижние уровни павшего улья. Там он и обнаружил следы, доказывающие, что Сципиона была охвачена скверной генетического искажения. Тысячи трупов выродков с лишними руками покоились в братской могиле!"

"One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"
languages.original_text: "Один цепкий клерк Администратума усомнился в подлинности отчетов, поступающих с руин улья Сципиона 84-249. Он сам посетил разбор завалов и спустился на нижние уровни павшего улья. Там он и обнаружил следы, доказывающие, что Сципиона была охвачена скверной генетического искажения. Тысячи трупов выродков с лишними руками покоились в братской могиле!"

traits.locale_text: "One tenacious clerk of the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered the signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the genetic distortion plague. Thousands of corpses of the degenerates with extra arms had been buried in the common grave!"

"One tenacious clerk of the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"

"One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"

languages.text: “某位倔强的内政部职员怀疑希皮奥内84-249废墟报告的真实性，于是他亲自参与了清理残骸的工作，亲自前往倒塌巢都的下层。在那里，他发现了希皮奥内感染基因瘟疫的迹象——几千具长着额外肢体的变种人尸体被埋在了乱葬坑里！”
languages.original_text: "One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"

traits.locale_text: “某位倔强的内政部职员怀疑希皮奥内84-249废墟报告的真实性，于是他亲自参与了清理残骸的工作，亲自前往倒塌巢都的下层。在那里，他发现了希皮奥内感染基因瘟疫的迹象——几千具长着额外肢体的变种人尸体被埋在了乱葬坑里！”

languages.text: «Un tenaz empleado del Administratum había puesto en duda la autenticidad de los informes procedentes de las ruinas de Escipión 84-249. Asistió personalmente al desescombro y entró en los niveles inferiores de la colmena caída. Allí descubrió indicios que demostraban que Escipión estaba infectada por la plaga genética. Miles de cadáveres de los degenerados superarmados habían sido enterrados en una fosa común».
languages.original_text: "One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"

traits.locale_text: «Un tenaz empleado del Administratum había puesto en duda la autenticidad de los informes procedentes de las ruinas de Escipión 84-249. Asistió personalmente al desescombro y entró en los niveles inferiores de la colmena caída. Allí descubrió indicios que demostraban que Escipión estaba infectada por la plaga genética. Miles de cadáveres de los degenerados superarmados habían sido enterrados en una fosa común».

languages.text: 「サイピオーネ84-249の廃墟から送られてきた報告書の信憑性について、管理局の頑固な事務官が疑問を述べてきた。彼は個人的に瓦礫の撤去に赴き、倒れたハイヴの下層に足を踏み入れたようだ。そこで彼は、サイピオーネで遺伝子ペストが蔓延していることを証明する兆候を発見した。腕がたくさん生えた何千もの堕落者の死体が、集団墓地に埋められていたそうだ」
languages.original_text: "One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"

traits.locale_text: 「サイピオーネ84-249の廃墟から送られてきた報告書の信憑性について、管理局の頑固な事務官が疑問を述べてきた。彼は個人的に瓦礫の撤去に赴き、倒れたハイヴの下層に足を踏み入れたようだ。そこで彼は、サイピオーネで遺伝子ペストが蔓延していることを証明する兆候を発見した。腕がたくさん生えた何千もの堕落者の死体が、集団墓地に埋められていたそうだ」

languages.text: « Un greffier particulièrement retors de l'Administratum a remis en question l'authenticité de rapports provenant des ruines de Scipione 84-249. Il a personnellement assisté à l'enlèvement des débris et a pénétré dans les niveaux inférieurs de la ruche en ruine. Il y a découvert des signes prouvant que la ville de Scipione avait été frappée par une épidémie génétique. Des milliers de cadavres de dégénérés armés jusqu'aux dents avaient été enterrés dans une fosse commune ! »
languages.original_text: "One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"

traits.locale_text: « Un greffier particulièrement retors de l'Administratum a remis en question l'authenticité de rapports provenant des ruines de Scipione 84-249. Il a personnellement assisté à l'enlèvement des débris et a pénétré dans les niveaux inférieurs de la ruche en ruine. Il y a découvert des signes prouvant que la ville de Scipione avait été frappée par une épidémie génétique. Des milliers de cadavres de dégénérés armés jusqu'aux dents avaient été enterrés dans une fosse commune ! »

languages.text: "Ein hartnäckiger Beamter des Administratums hatte die Echtheit der Berichte aus den Ruinen von Scipione 84-249 angezweifelt. Er hat die Beseitigung der Trümmer persönlich besichtigt und ist in die unteren Ebenen der gefallenen Makropole gefangen. Dort hat er Beweise entdeckt, dass Scipione von der Genseuche befallen war. Tausende von Leichen der vielarmigen Degenerierten waren in einem Massengrab verscharrt worden!"
languages.original_text: "One tenacious clerk from the Administratum had questioned the authenticity of the reports coming from the ruins of Scipione 84-249. He personally attended the debris removal and entered the lower levels of the fallen hive. There he discovered signs that proved Scipione to be infected by the gene plague. Thousands of corpses of the extra-armed degenerates had been buried in a mass grave!"
